name: Pong de pana The Game
description:
Very first solo game project with objective to learn the basics of Godot, following the youtube tutorial Learn Godot by creating Pong by the youtube channel Clear Code

Here I use the assets of the video (ball sprite, paddle sprite and two very simple audio files), then I add some music I made, put some effects to the audio files in Godot, I draw the game title and the tutorial image in the phone app Autodesk SketchBook.
